name: Rusty Sword
description: A weathered blade that's seen better days. Still sharp enough to draw blood.

name: Wooden Club
description: A sturdy branch that serves as a crude weapon.

name: Wooden Bow
description: A simple hunting bow. Quick and deadly in the right hands. 15% critical hit chance.

name: Iron Axe
description: A heavy woodcutter's axe. Brutal and effective. 10% critical hit chance.

name: Steel Spear
description: A well-balanced spear with a sharp tip. Strikes true more often than not. 20% critical hit chance.

name: Assassin's Dagger
description: A curved blade designed for precision strikes. Deadly in skilled hands. 35% critical hit chance!

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Interlocking metal rings that absorb blows. Heavier but much safer.

name: Plate Armor
description: Solid metal plates covering vital areas. The ultimate protection for warriors.

name: Health Potion
description: Restores 20 HP. Tastes like bitter herbs.

name: Greater Health Potion
description: Restores 50 HP. A powerful elixir brewed by master alchemists.

name: Mega Health Potion
description: Restores 100 HP. The pinnacle of healing magic.

name: Tax Coins
description: The realm's currency, stamped with the Tax Collector's seal. Heavy with bureaucratic burden.

name: Tax Receipt
description: Proof of payment to the ever-hungry coffers of Grafton. Keep it safe.
